GSD.description:
ext4: avoid remove directory when directory is corrupted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit b02787042cb31c6f8c65805636fbbb8b653bbea0. For more details please see the references link.
